vv33:16.1: (Anantaraṃ caturavimānaṃ yathā vatthadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ.) → (yathā ca tattha evaṃ upari sabbavimānesu vitthāretabbaṃ) (bj), Anantaraṃ → itaraṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
vv33:56.1: (Anantaraṃ caturavimānaṃ yathā gandhapañcaṅgulikadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ.) → etthantare pāṭho bj potthake
vv33:72.3: Anusūyikā → anussūyikā (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed) | anussuyyikā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), upaṭṭhāsiṃ → sūpaṭṭhāsiṃ (bj)
vv33:78.3: Akkodhanānatimāninī → akkodhanā anatimānī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | anatimāni (pts-vp-pli1ed)
vv33:88.1: Anantaraṃ pañcavīsativimānaṃ yathā khīrodanadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ →  etthantare pāṭho si potthake
vv33:144.1: Imāsāhaṃ → imāhaṃ (bj) | tāsāhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr), sutvā → sutvāna (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
